text: (ākavē, iṟaivaṉ iplīsai nōkki) ‘‘nāṉ uṉakkuk kaṭṭaḷaiyiṭṭa camayattil, nī (ciram) paṇiyātirukkumpaṭi uṉṉait taṭai ceytatu etu?'' Eṉṟu kēṭka, (ataṟku iplīs) ‘‘nāṉ avaraiviṭa mēlāṉavaṉ. (Ēṉeṉṟāl,) nī eṉṉai neruppāl paṭaittāy. Avarai kaḷimaṇṇāl paṭaittirukkiṟāy. (Kaḷimaṇṇaiviṭa neruppu uyarntatu)'' eṉṟu (iṟumāppuṭaṉ) kūṟiṉāṉ
